entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Marathon
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 09:33 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Snow, -9.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Marathon Airport 09:00 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023
Condition: Snow
Temperature: -9.1°C
Pressure: 100.9 kPa
Visibility: 0.8 km
Humidity: 88 %
Wind Chill: -14
Dewpoint: -10.7°C
Wind: SW 9 km/h gust 44 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. Temperature falling to minus 13 this morning then rising.
entry.summary: Periods of snow and local blowing snow ending near noon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Amount 5 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming west 20 near noon then light early this afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 13 this morning then rising. Wind chill minus 23 this morning and minus 12 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light late in the morning. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023
